items.sentence: Tom knew that something terrible might happen.
Tom knows I want to leave as soon as possible.
I thought you said you used to live in Boston.
I thought you said you wanted to go to Boston.
I told Tom that everything was going to be OK.
It would be inappropriate to discuss that now.
Tom didn\'t tell me he couldn\'t speak French.
Tom knew Mary didn\'t have to do that anymore.
Tom was booed by a number of audience members.
Tom was braver than any of the other soldiers.
Tom was brutally murdered on October 20, 2013.
Tom thought Mary wouldn\'t be able to do that.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t like doing that.
Tom told Mary that he didn\'t want to do that.
Tom thinks he\'s the best French speaker here.
Tom thinks he\'s the best French teacher here.
Tom thought Mary knew why he didn\'t like her.
I can\'t believe Tom\'s getting married again.
Tom doesn\'t have a car. He just uses Mary\'s.
The windows were already open when I got here.
